author: Lisa Shumaker
title: U.S. coronavirus deaths approach 30,000 - Reuters tally
description: Total U.S. coronavirus deaths were approaching 30,000 on Wednesday, after a record single-day increase in COVID-19-related fatalities the prior day, according to a Reuters tally.
content:
(Reuters) - Total U.S. coronavirus deaths were approaching 30,000 on Wednesday, after a record single-day increase in COVID-19-related fatalities the prior day, according to a Reuters tally. 
The United States reported 2,364 deaths on Tuesday, far above the … [+1665 chars]
